requests.name: Update an address
requests.description: Use a PATCH request to the address’s endpoint to update an address’s metadata. The body can be a JSON object with only the data you want to change.

requests.name: Initiating an OAuth connection
requests.description: In order to initiate OAuth access for your MailChimp App, you'll first need to send a MailChimp user to an authorization page, where that user will need to grant access to your app.

requests.name: Get Access Token and Refresh Tokens
requests.description: Use the code you get after a user authorizes your app to get an access token and refresh token.  The access token will be used to authenticate requests that your app makes.

requests.name: Get metadata
requests.description: Use a previously obtained refresh token to generate a new access token.  Access tokens expire after 6 hours, so if you need offline access to data in HubSpot, you'll need to store the refresh token you get when initiating your OAuth integration, and use that to generate a new access token once the initial access token expires.

requests.name: Get interest category
requests.description: Get all interests in a specific category

requests.name: Get interest categories
requests.description: Get information about a list’s interest categories

requests.name: Subscribe an Address
requests.description: Send a POST request to the List Members endpoint
